description: Number of directed 2-multigraphs on n nodes.
comments: A 2-multigraph is similar to an ordinary graph except there are 0, 1 or 2 edges between any two nodes (self-loops are not allowed).
mathematica: Table[CycleIndex[PairGroup[SymmetricGroup[n], Ordered], t] /.Table[t[i] -> 1 + x^i + y^i, {i, 1, n^2}] /. {x -> 1, y -> 1}, {n, 1, 7}] (* _Geoffrey Critzer_, Mar 08 2011 *)
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Jan 13 2000
